analysis module¶

class analysis.Process(data: Union[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, numpy.ndarray])¶

Bases: object

processing methods

drop_col(key: str, name: str)¶

Drops a specific column of a pd dataframe.

Parameters

  • key (str) – str for lookup in dict

  • name (str) – name of the column to drop

filter_data(key: str = 'raw_data', treshv: float = 1e-05)¶

drop columns where the variance is below treshold. Only for Pandas DataFrames

Parameters

  • key (str) – key for lookup in dict, default: “raw_data”

  • treshv (float, optional) – treshold value, defaults to 1.0e-5

Returns

Dataframe without dropped columns

Return type

pd.DataFrame

plot_columns(key: str, idx: Optional[int] = None)¶

Plot for Pandas DataFrames

Parameters

  • key (str) – key for lookup in dict

  • idx (int, optional) – index, defaults to None

class analysis.ProcessNumerical(data: Union[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, numpy.ndarray])¶

Bases: analysis.Process

Class containing methods for numerical analysis. It inherits methods for data processing from the Process class.

Parameters

data (pd.DataFrame or np.ndarray) – pre-processed data

compute_autocorrelation(key: str) → numpy.ndarray¶

Compute the autocorrelation

Parameters

key (str) – self.data dictionary value for which the autocorrelation needs to be computed

Returns

autocorrelation vector

Return type

np.ndarray

create_complex_matrix(key: str)¶

Convert the real data matrix containing columns of real and imaginary values into a complex matrix

Parameters

key (str) – self.data dictionary value where the real and imaginary values are stored

discrete_fourier_transform(key: str)¶

Compute the discrete fourier transform

Parameters

key (str) – self.data dictionary value for which the discrete fourier transform needs to be computed

Returns

discrete fourier transform

Return type

np.ndarray

class analysis.ProcessStatistical(data: Union[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, numpy.ndarray])¶

Bases: analysis.Process

Class containing methods for statistical analysis. It inherits methods for data processing from the Process class.

Parameters

data (pd.DataFrame or np.ndarray) – pre-processed data

correlation(key: str)¶

Calculates Correlation Matrix of Dataframe, removes the lower triangular. The output will be flattened and sorted by absolute value.

Parameters

key (str) – self.data dictionary value for which the correlation matrix needs to be computed

Returns

correlation matrix flattened and sorted by absolute value

Return type

np.ndarray

distance(key: str, idx_list1: list, idx_list2: list)¶

Calculates the Euclidean distance between 2 columns of an array.

Parameters

  • key (str) – self.data dictionary value for which the distance needs to be computed

  • idx_list1 (list[int]) – list of column indices

  • idx_list2 (list[int]) – list of column indices

Returns

L2 distance between the columns idx_list1 and idx_list2 of self.data[key]

Return type

np.ndarray

Bases: object

Class for reading in the data. Either as numpy array or as pandas Dataframe.

The data either as Pandas Dataframe or Numpy Array.
